full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSCG) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to procure rental services of 10- and 12-wheel dump trucks with operators for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Valcartier and Quebec City.

## Tender Details

### Reference Information

* Solicitation Number: WS3717412041
* Tender Closing Date: November 23, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* Tender Status: Expired

### Details About the Goods/Services

* UNSPSC Code: *78142004*
* Product Description: Rental of truck with operator

### Procurement Process

* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### End User Information

* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Annie Deslauriers (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: [Click here](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14568594?extsite=MTQ1Njg1OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note that the due date was missed, and this tender is considered expired. However, I must mention the following for historical purposes and helpful documentation:

### Tender Details (Expired)

* Tender Description: PWGSC is issuing this RFSO to get rental services of 10 and/or 12 wheel dump trucks with their respective operator for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Valcartier and Quebec City.
* Tender Submissions: All required supporting documentation and bid
